alert.note: Alert for Crane; Ector; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:52PM CDT until May 12 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN ECTOR...NORTHEASTERN WARD AND NORTHWESTERN CRANE COUNTIES... At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of West Odessa, or 16 miles northeast of Monahans, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Odessa, West Odessa, Notrees, Penwell and Monahans Sandhills State Park. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 85 and 115. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
